org.lappsgrid.core

Class DataFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lappsgrid.core.DataFactory

  • public class DataFactory
extends Object
    A factory class for creating org.lappsgrid.serialization.Data objects for the most commonly used types.
    Author:
    Keith Suderman

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataFactory

        protected DataFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • ok

        public static String ok()
        An empty Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/ok

      • ok

        public static String ok(boolean pretty)
        Returns an pretty-printed empty Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/ok}.

      • error

        public static String error(String errorMessage)
        Returns a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/error. The errorMessage is stored in the payload unchanged.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage -
        Returns:

      • error

        public static String error(Throwable error)
        Returns a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/error. The stack-trace from the exception is included in the payload as a string.
        Parameters:
        error - The cause of the error

      • error

        public static String error(String message,
           Throwable error)
        Returns a data object with the disscriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/error. The error message and stack trace from the exception are included in the payload.
        Parameters:
        message - an error message
        error - the cause of the error

      • query

        public static String query(String queryString)
        Not used at this time.

      • get

        public static String get(String id)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/action/get}. Get objects are sent to Datasource services to retrieve a single document.
        Parameters:
        id - the document id to be retrieved from the datasource.
        Returns:

      • list

        public static String list()
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/action/list.

      • list

        public static String list(int start,
          int end)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/action/list.

      • index

        public static String index(String[] items)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/string-list. This method will likely be deprecated for the more aptly named stringList methods.

      • stringList

        public static String stringList(String[] items)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/list.

      • stringList

        public static String stringList(List<String> list)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/list.

      • text

        public static String text(String text)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/text. The payload with contain a String object with the text.

      • document

        public static String document(String document)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Document. Not used at this time.

      • xml

        public static String xml(String xml)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/media/xml. The payload will contain a String object with the XML.

      • gateDocument

        public static String gateDocument(String document)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/xml#gate. The payload will contain the GATE/XML.

      • gate

        public static String gate(String document)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/xml#gate. The payload will contain the GATE/XML.

      • oneperline

        public static String oneperline(String text)

      • opl

        public static String opl(String text)

      • json

        public static String json(String text)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/json. The payload will contain the the text, which is expected to be a JSON object.

      • jsonLD

        public static String jsonLD(String text)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/jsonld. The payload will contain the the text, which is expected to be a JSON-LD document.

      • lapps

        public static String lapps(String json)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/media/jsonld#lif. The payload will contain the the text, which is expected to be a JSON-LD document that conforms to the LIF Schema.

      • meta

        public static String meta(String json)
        Creates a Data object with the discriminator set to http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/ns/meta. The payload will contain the the text, which is expected to be a JSON-LD document that conforms to either the schema for services or the schema or datasources
